references.paper_title: A survey on evaluation of large language models
references.reason: This survey provides a broad overview of the challenges and methods used to evaluate large language models, making it a fundamental reference for understanding evaluation methodologies in the field.
This paper introduces a foundational approach to visual instruction tuning, a technique central to enhancing the capabilities of vision-language models.

references.paper_title: MMBench: Is your multi-modal model an all-around player?
references.reason: This benchmark is widely recognized for its comprehensive evaluation of multimodal models across various tasks.

references.paper_title: A survey on evaluation of multimodal large language models
references.reason: This survey provides a thorough overview of evaluation techniques relevant to multimodal large language models, highlighting key challenges.

references.paper_title: A survey on multimodal large language models
references.reason: This paper surveys multimodal LLMs, covering architectures, training strategies, and applications, thus offering a comprehensive background.
